title: Emerald Ore
desc:
Post 792
- When stood on, you gain an Emerald point whenever you draw.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 3 hit to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and is instead created when a 788 is played before a <:lime:1108048230542999633> card.
